author: chfast
content: Are we expecting more test for the deposit contract logs parsing? I have not implemented any changes and I'm still passing all the tests in the latest EEST.

author: marioevz
content:
There's an open PR that <@508125616940515329> is helping us put together: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/1371

You could try to fill these tests with evmone and see what the outcome is, I feel like this would need the `blockException` field in the t8n, just like 7002 and 7251 tests.

author: marioevz
content: We use a single tx always for state tests, it's actuallly an error to try to do one with multiple txs (afaik)
